titleStmt.title: Albert Stagner et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2717

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p: To his Excellency the Gov. of Ky --

Your Petitioners represent that an additional Notary Public in & for the County of Madison is necessary to the Convenience of the Citizens of the County & they recomend James B. McCreary as a Suitable person to fill that office. They would further Suggest that his immediate appointment is desirable as next monday is the County Court in Madison at which time he could give bond & qualify

Albert Stagner
Turner Boone
James Levis
J. S. Rippert
Elias Barnes
Jas. Fife
Martin Gentry
H. J. Bennett,
Thos Bronston Jr
L. E. Francis
W. S Harris
Wm Smith Collins
M Lalor
John Y. Cole
W B. Mize
E F Rigg
A. T. Chenault
Coleman Covington
S. W. Embry
C J, Smith
